scripts.prebuild: mkdir build > /dev/null || echo > /dev/null && mkdir dist > /dev/null || echo > /dev/null && npm install
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run format && npm run webpack
scripts.build:watch: npm run prebuild && npm run webpack -- --watch
scripts.start:build: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.prepackage: npm run clean && npm run build && cp package.json build
scripts.package: npm run prepackage && npm run electron-packager -- --platform=all
scripts.package:darwin: npm run prepackage && npm run electron-packager -- --platform=darwin
scripts.clean:win: if exist build rmdir /s /q build & if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist
scripts.prebuild:win: if not exist build mkdir build & if not exist dist mkdir dist & npm install
scripts.build:win: npm run prebuild:win && npm run format && npm run webpack
scripts.build:win:watch: npm run prebuild:win && npm run format && npm run webpack -- --watch
scripts.start:build:win: npm run build:win && npm run start
scripts.prepackage:win: npm run clean:win && npm run build:win && copy /v /y package.json build
scripts.package:win: npm run prepackage:win && npm run electron-packager -- --platform=all
